description:
Seth heads for Artemis Academy in search of clues as to where he can find Radiant. On the way, he runs into Captain Dragunov of the Inquisition, an organization that cracks down on sorcerers. Even though Seth did nothing wrong, he`s thrown in a cage just for being a sorcerer. When all his attempts to escape fail, he meets a red-haired girl named Melie, who`s also in a cage. Meanwhile Alma, who`s still worried about Seth, is visited by a man called Doc who calls himself a researcher...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Meeting in the Sky: Encounter
